---
id: post-pix-infraction-report-close-v-2
title: "Close Infraction Report"
description: "Closes the infraction report."
sidebar_label: "Close Infraction Report"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Close Infraction Report"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/infraction-report/{infractionReportId}/close"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Closes the infraction report.

The infraction report must be closed by the counterparty participant. To close, the status must be `ACKNOWLEDGED`.

If the closure is with the `AGREED` analysis result, a [fraud mark](#operation/post-pix-anti-fraud) will be automatically generated.
The marking id will appear in the `FraudMarkerId` field of the response. In these cases, the participant must inform the <b>'FraudType'</b> field.
Valid values are `APPLICATION_FRAUD`, `MULE_ACCOUNT`, `SCAMMER_ACCOUNT` and `OTHER`.

<b><span style="font-family:'Courier New';color:red">ATTENTION:</span></b> the `UNKNOWN` type is not valid for API v2. It is only used as
descriptive value in infraction notifications created in API v1, when the type of fraud was not part of the data in the notification.

The generated fraud mark can be [canceled](#operation/post-pix-anti-fraud-cancel) by the counterparty participant, responsible for closing
of the infraction report.

### Idempotence
The operation is idempotent. If the notification has already been closed with the same parameters,
a response equivalent to the first request will be returned.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"InfractionReportIdentifier":{"value":"91d65e98-97c0-4b0f-b577-73625da1f9fc"}},"name":"infractionReportId","description":"Infraction Report Identifier.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixInfractionCloseReportRequest","description":"","required":["analysisResult"],"type":"object","properties":{"analysisDetails":{"description":"Details of the infraction's analysis, which can guide the payer of the next steps. Max length: 2000. <span style=\"color: red;\">Required if FraudType = OTHER.</span>","maxLength":2000,"type":"string","readOnly":false},"analysisResult":{"description":"Result of the infraction analysis.","enum":["AGREED","DISAGREED"],"type":"string"},"fraudType":{"description":"Verified fraud type. <span style=\"color: red;\">Required if AnalysisResult = AGREED.</span>","enum":["APPLICATION_FRAUD","MULE_ACCOUNT","SCAMMER_ACCOUNT","OTHER","UNKNOWN"],"type":"string"}},"example":{"analysisDetails":"Details of the infraction's analysis, which can guide the payer of the next steps","analysisResult":"AGREED"}},"examples":{"PixInfractionCloseReportRequest":{"value":{"analysisDetails":"Amount blocked to refund.","analysisResult":"AGREED","fraudType":"SCAMMER_ACCOUNT"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
